oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Jimmie Loftis interview
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Loftis, Jimmie; Vietnam War, 1961-1975
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Lt. James Loftis served in the 2nd Civil Affairs, in which he was a combat engineer and unit commander. He was in Vietnam September 1969 to September 1970.
